name: PORTAL (itch) (Lord games)
description: PORTAL IS A REALLY NICE GAME.BUT I MUST CONFESS IT IS QUITE HARD TO PLAY,BUT IF U PLAY HARD YOU WILL SURVIVE,"OHHHH" I ALSO FORGET TO MENTION  (THERE IS A QUEST TO COMPLETE). AFTER COMPLETING THE QUEST THERE IS PRICE FOR THE SURVIVER.                                                                                                           (SO PLAY HARD AND SURVIVE)                                                                                                                       HAVE FUN AND SURVIVE
